name: MovieMania
0:
”Alexa, open movie mania”
”launch movie mania”
”ask movie mania”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: movie mania
des:
If you are a kind of person who loves Bollywood industry then my friend, this skill takes you through the journey of a lot of famous Bollywood movies dialogues. 
The user have to correctly identify the movie name corresponding to a particular dialogue.
Also, don't you worry about repetition of a particular dialogue. We made sure that no dialogue is repeated throughout the use of this skill. 

If the user doesn't know the correct movie name, he/she can just say "I don't know". To repeat a particular dialogue, the user should say "repeat".

The user can ask for help anytime by saying "help" or can exit, stop and cancel the skill by saying exit, stop and cancel respectively.

We have permission to use all the contents in this skill wherever we want. you may contact chitresh.achiever@gmail.com if you have any query.
Also, we are constantly adding new dialogues daily so that the user can play this game for forever. 

Special mention - You might want to try our other skills. 
https://alexa.amazon.com/spa/index.html#skills/dp/B07B7HJ7ZQ/?ref=skill_dsk_skb_sr_0&qid=1521803995 and https://alexa.amazon.com/spa/index.html#skills/dp/B07BB151YB/?ref=skill_dsk_skb_sr_3&qid=1521804033
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
